    Osric Wilkinson (osric@fluffypeople.com)

      • setStartActionStatus

        void setStartActionStatus(boolean enabled,
                        boolean downloading)
        Sets the state of the StartAction.

        The action can be either enabled or disabled, and should be disabled when the queue is empty, enabled otherwise, and can be showing either "Start downloading" (when there are no downloads running) or "Stop downloading" (when there are downloads running).

        Parameters:
        enabled - boolean true if there are files queued, false otherwise.
        downloading - boolean true if there is an active download, false otherwise.

      • isVisible

        boolean isVisible()
        True if the top level window is visible, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the top level window is visible.
